# transitionProgress

**Instance Property**

The completion percentage of the transition.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var transitionProgress: CGFloat { get set }
```

## Discussion

During the transition, set the value of this property periodically and call the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCollectionViewLayout/invalidateLayout()] method to force the collection view to update item positions. For example, when driving a transition using a gesture recognizer, you can set this property from the handler method of your gesture recognizer.

## Updating the Transition Information

- **updateValue(_:forAnimatedKey:)**: Sets the value of a key whose value you use during the animation.
- **value(forAnimatedKey:)**: Returns the most recently set value for the specified key.
- **NSCollectionViewTransitionLayout.AnimatedKey**
